Package spring2024.cs472.hotelwebsite.entities

Class ReservationDetails

java.lang.Object
spring2024.cs472.hotelwebsite.entities.ReservationDetails
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Entity public class ReservationDetails extends Object implements Serializable
Represents reservation details. This class is stored for guests' viewing of reservations in their account. It contains information about the guest, room reservations, payment information, and total cost.
Author:
Team ABCFG
